page.title: 09Changes in retailing_B'head
page.content: A significant change that has taken place in this area during the last ten years was the demise of many of the local shops. This was accounted for by the expansion and rebuilding of the town Shopping Centre which provides multiple chain store outlets , super- markets and hypermarkets.There were mixed feelings about this development: "Centralising the market and shops is helpful ,a wide range of goods are in a compact area ." "I feel it has taken a lot away from the town centre ,old buildings gave it an individual character.Now it is just like hundreds of others up and down the country." "Shoppers are more willing to travel now that they have more public and private transport and this has killed off the "corner-shop."
